entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 11 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind light except north 30 km/h along parts of the coast. Low minus 15 except minus 11 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
